690520615128862720.text: We are at Katerera, Rubirizi now. https://t.co/LxuPpheGGV

690516840670466049.text: There are no government secondary schools in Rubirizi. We will build classroom infrastructure and also cater for teaching staff accommodatn

690515961150099456.text: Rubirizi locals survive off fishing in Lake Kashaka. Unfortunately they r attacked by crocodiles. We must balance safe fishing and tourism.

690514517005094912.text: Today in Rubirizi we discussed the problem of banana wilt and what my government shall do to combat it. Research for disease resistant stems

690393774447562753.text: Good morning. I will be in Rubiruzi and Buhweju today. https://t.co/N8HKwVTDLI

690200846773125120.text: In Ruhinda South and Mitooma generally where I talked about the need to rethink SACCOs and jobs for the youth. https://t.co/npFj0BLVnP

690197796713013248.text: At Butare, Kyamuhunga this morning where I talked about jobs for the youth, a referral hospital in Bushenyi and more https://t.co/xmXSWoyXM1

689868799894495232.text: We will through research schools engineer strands of banana that can  withstand the wilt. Government support to research will be increased.

689867622129745921.text: In Mbarara, part of my government policy shall be to look into eradicating banana wilt. The income of farmers depends on this.

689867415623200768.text: The most important tool to increased income is increased productivity & security of mrkt. I will set up commodity exchange to minimize risk.

689866904165584896.text: I will look into debt relief for farmers. Farmer loans that are over five Million shall be reviewed.

689866302895362048.text: This has left many rural farmers at risk of loss of all assets. This cannot be. With the advanced sub county model, the crop is collateral.

689865746575429632.text: In Sheema today I spoke on SACCOs and the problems with the current model. Farmers are mortgaging the small pieces of land for capital.

689865235327537152.text: I have spoken on poverty today and the steps we should take to combat it. https://t.co/UVnvpkpPm4

687179683629260800.text: When I started this journey in June 2015, I said then that we have 8 key pillars for dev't. We have spoken on all of these at each rally.

687178042414907392.text: TDA (U)/Go Forward through programmes such as the advanced Subcounty model, jobs for all, universal healthcare, etc will enable this change.

687177194490171392.text: Tororo has great potential especially if a lot of emphasis is put for industrialization. The people are hardworking with good work ethics.

687176490845376512.text: Our aspirations as Ugandans is for a better Uganda. Exodus 14:15 talks about children of God going forward. Let us move forward peacefully.

687175061422403584.text: Keep the spirit of change alive. Even when you are discouraged you keep going. On voting day, leave no one at home.

687174755762442240.text: Safeguarding this change starts now before the vote. Be vigilant. Ensure your household is informed and your neighbours hear the message.

687174359937597440.text: Protecting the future starts now by protecting the vote. My interactions across the Country shows overwhelming support for change.

687173697346600960.text: It is this transition that shall keep us on the path of progress. So we must identify and nurture the next generation and prepare for this.

687173073653620736.text: I do believe that as a Country, we must prepare for a transition. We have never had peaceful transition from one generation to the next.

687172657591271424.text: I therefore am a candidate for "Change". Change in how we work, efficiency, and output.

687172002789068800.text: This is the first change that I under the #GoForward platform will ensure. That we build strong institutions and fill all vacancies.

687171722525732864.text: Government works efficiently when strong institutions exists. This is why I am standing. I believe we must build strong institutions.
